summary.para: Retrieves the rectangle that describes the rectangle geometry's dimensions.

param.name: rect
param.para: Contains a pointer to a rectangle that describes the rectangle geometry's dimensions when this method returns. You must allocate storage for this parameter.

remarks.para: To create a rectangle geometry, use the ID2D1Factory.CreateRectangleGeometry method.

Direct2D geometries are immutable and device-independent resources created by . In general, you should create geometries once and retain them for the life of the application, or until they need to be modified. For more information about device-independent and device-dependent resources, see the Resources Overview.
